article_title: GOP Sens. Say Recovery Of ACA Exchange Funds Fell Short
article_text:
GOP Sens. Say Recovery Of ACA Exchange Funds Fell Short

Law360, New York (May 11, 2016, 5:52 PM ET) -- The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid can only prove it recovered about $21.5 million from foundering Affordable Care Act exchanges, a far cry from the more than $200 million CMS Acting Administrator Andy Slavitt pointed to in December, House Republicans said Tuesday.



In its report, the House Energy and Commerce Committee took issue with Slavitt’s opening remarks at an Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee hearing, in which he said that more than $200 million worth of the original federal grants given to states to set up ACA...

To view the full article, register now.
